name: Heli/Attack
description:
Heli/Attack allows you to control a RC Helicopter that shoots missiles. In contrast to RC Helicopter Simulators, Heli/Attack is about having fun while learning the controls instead of realism.

Nevertheless, it provides you an aerobatics mode and you score more points if you hit the target while flying inverted.

System Requirements

A Gamepad is required to play. Mouse/ Keyboard controls are not supported.

  • OpenGL 3.3 compatible GPU (GeForce 100M or better)
  • Gamepad
  • Intel Core 2 Duo or better
Yours to keep

The game is not only DRM free, but is also liberally licensed, which allows you to edit and repurpose it as you like.

However, when sharing keep in mind that if nobody pays for the game, I will not be able to add new content for you.
